name: ploticus

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Ploticus can produce various types of plots and graphs.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: libpng
dependencies.description: libpng is the official PNG reference library.

dependencies.name: zlib-api
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependent_to.name: ipm
dependent_to.description:
IPM is a portable profiling infrastructure for parallel codes. It
provides a low-overhead profile of application performance and resource
utilization in a parallel program. Communication, computation, and IO
are the primary focus.
